A man arrested on suspicion of pushing his girlfriend onto the New York City subway tracks — causing both her feet to be severed by a train — had been imprisoned for attacking a woman and threatening to hurl her child off a fire escape in 2017, police say. https://t.co/nJRrKIOezT

item.title: 新的研究显示，由于地陷（土地逐渐塌陷或下沉），到 2050 年，美国 32 个沿海城市的大量土地可能面临被洪水淹没的风险。
item.description:
A considerable amount of land in 32 U.S. coastal cities could be at risk of flooding by 2050 due to subsidence, the gradual caving in or sinking of an area of land, according to new research. https://t.co/ijAh8xDdUu
